title: If there is no data for series, it should pop up a friendly error message to remind.
OB: Currently, when there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed.
EB: If there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be shown to remind the user.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Load the application.
2. Navigate to the series page.
3. Remove all data for a series.
4. Check if an error message is displayed.
